list.name: Default
list.comment: we need to make sure if the folder UI doesnt exist create one from scratch

task.summary: Default task
commiting the directory for the first time.

promoted parameters to the UI.

when promoting the blend shapes, by pass off

promoted view bones parameter
change the way the we connect the chains, instead parenting one after the other now they are independent and one pointing to another, that way they can move them freely.
by passes the xform zero so the bone mesh sits properly now that we change the way the chains are connected.
